fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Screech**: Screech at one player, redirecting them to a non Minecraft player at random.
**Stalk**: Stalk a player, learning who they visit and who visits them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-**Echolocation**: Each day, you learn one players role. You are aware of which player you learned the role from, and you cannot learn from the same player twice.
-You see astral visits
-Redirection immune
-Roleblock immune

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Slay all else and turn them into gear
